configuration.name: config1
configuration.label: OAuth config
configuration.value: The following fields are needed to access to the Veritone API.

configuration.name: environment
configuration.label: Environment
configuration.description: Select the environment to target for the AI Data API and AI Data Admin. (If you are unsure, select 'Production')

configuration.name: region
configuration.label: Geographic region
configuration.description: Select the geographic region to be targeted by the AI Data API and AI Data Admin. (Custom allowed i.e. 'us-1'. If you are unsure, select 'Without region')

configuration.name: apiToken
configuration.label: API token
configuration.description: API token generated in the Veritone Admin Console

configuration.label: Client Id
configuration.name: clientId
configuration.description: The client ID of your Veritone App

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: The client secret of your Veritone App
configuration.name: clientSecret
oauthCallback
configuration.label: OAuth callback
configuration.description: The OAuth URL to configure in your Veritone App (Copy this value and paste it in the 'URL' field of your Veritone App).

configuration.name: webhooksUrl
configuration.label: Webhooks URL
configuration.description: The URL to configure in webhooks of your GitHub App

configuration.name: apiSwitch
configuration.label: Api switch
configuration.description: Select the API you want to use. (You can use this property with the dynamic properties scripts, set this as default api)

events.label: Webhook
events.name: webhook
events.description: Event triggered when there is a webhook coming from PandaDoc.

events.label: Callback
events.name: callback
events.description: Happens when a async process is finished
